mods.abstract: Two color window card (brown and green on white) announcing the 2013 Americana Honors and Awards with Jim Lauderdale, Stephen Stills, JD McPherson, Old Crow Medicine Show, Robert Hunter, Emmylou Harris and Rodney Crowell, John Fullbright, Richard Thompson, Duane Eddy, Lennon and Maisy Stella, Holly Williams, Shovels and Rope, Milk Carton Kids, Dr. John, Kelly Willis and Bruce Robinson at the Ryman Auditorium on September 18. Poster features woodcuts of stars and music notes.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
